entries.description: Using the least permissive set of scopes for features during BuilderID/SSO login. Using the same connection for multiple features will request additional scopes to be used.
Add support for Lambda Runtime Java17
Fix the Add Connection Dialog boxÂ references to the correct documentation pages
Fix thread access during validation of SAM templates
[CodeWhisperer]: login session length should increase to it's expected length. Users will now see less frequent expired sessions.
Improve handling of disk errors related to SSO and align folder permissions with AWS CLI
